channel.title: Active Directory on Azure 4 Everyone
channel.description: Adam Marczak blog created for purpose of personal contribution and sharing knowledge to communities everywhere.

item.description: My latest tutorial about basics of Azure Active Directory is here. It is a very powerful identity and access management service that is very well integrated with majority of Microsoft’s cloud services.

item.title: Managed Identities with Azure AD (Active Directory) Tutorial
item.description: Azure AD Managed Identities are one of the best features when it comes to authentication across multiple Azure services. They are secure, managed by Azure AD and incur no additional cost.
